reporter_caption.center: P.W. v. K.L., 72 Mass. App. Ct. 1108 (2008)

opinion.opinion_text: Decisions Pursuant to Rule 1:28. The July 11, 2006, judgments on (a) the father's January 13, 2003, and July 6, 2004, complaints for modification; (b) the father's January 13, 2003, complaint for contempt; and (c) the mother's April 10, 2003, complaint for modification are affirmed. The July 25, 2006, judgment on the father's March 1, 2006, complaint for contempt is affirmed. The May 15, 2007, order denying the father's motion for reconsideration is affirmed. The May 15, 2007, order allowing the mother's motion to strike is affirmed.
